title: Governor docs example fails to compile
body:
<!-- Briefly describe the issue you're experiencing. Tell us what you were trying to do and what happened instead. -->
# Overview
Using the Governor [example](https://github.com/openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/d59306bd06a241083841c2e4a39db08e1f3722cc/docs/modules/ROOT/pages/governance.adoc#L144-L245 ) in the docs fails to compile due to an incorrect override in line 188.

<!-- Remember, this is not a place to ask for help debugging code. For that, we welcome you in the OpenZeppelin Community Forum: https://forum.openzeppelin.com/. -->

## **üíª Environment**

hardhat `2.12.6`
solidity `^0.8.2`
ubuntu `22.04.1 LTS`

<!-- Tell us what version of OpenZeppelin Contracts you're using, and how you're using it: Truffle, Remix, etc. -->

## **üìù Details**

In [line 188](https://github.com/openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/d59306bd06a241083841c2e4a39db08e1f3722cc/docs/modules/ROOT/pages/governance.adoc#L188) of the Governor docs, the `getVotes` function overrides `GovernorVotes` rather than `Governor` which causes compilation of the file to fail.
<!-- Describe the problem you have been experiencing in more detail. Include as much information as you think is relevant. Keep in mind that transactions can fail for many reasons; context is key here. -->

## **üî¢ Code to reproduce bug**

1. Create a new file named `MyGovernor.sol` in the `contracts/` folder of this repo and copy the contents of lines 145-243 below into the file.
https://github.com/openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/d59306bd06a241083841c2e4a39db08e1f3722cc/docs/modules/ROOT/pages/governance.adoc#L145-L243
2. Run `npm install` or `npm run compile` to compile the contracts

<!-- We will be able to better help if you provide a minimal example that triggers the bug. -->
